channel.title: Runescape is back up
channel.description:
[size=36pt]RUNESCAPE IS BACK UP[/size] 1) My stats are gone way back in the highscores. A = They have been set to how they was at 1 AM [b]GMT[/b] Apon logging in they will be updated.
2) Adventurer's Log says my account does not exist. A = It will be back up when the game is online.
3) Aventurer's Log says my account did stuff that i did not. A = Happened to me to, says i got 31 dungoeneering whilst i got 31, wait till the game is back online, log in and out then check it again.
4) How long will the rollback be? A = Approx. 30mins may be abit less or longer, the rollback will be set to 1second before the glitch occured.
5) What was the glitch? A = You gained huge RuneCrafting EXP Whilst crafting runes in the minigame, Approx. 200k per 100 ess.
6) Why is Runescapes forums getting spammed? A = Not only mopar has fucking idiots posting spam.
7) I LOST ITEMS WHAT CAN I DO? A1 = [B]EVEN IF YOU DID[/B] Nothing, if they go according to what you say they will end up giving you a maxed account with moderator's status and max cash + unlimited banking space.
[b]A2 = NEW STATEMENT BY JAGEX SAYS THEY WILL ONLY ROLLBACK EXP. (LETS HOPE ONLY RCING EXP)[/b] ([b]NOT 100% ACCURATE[/b])
8) How did runescape find the glitch? A = I heard something about youtube and it was reported via the Forums. Youtube Link: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NlchO9QRR4A]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NlchO9QRR4A[/url]
9) Any other glitches you know about dungeoneering? A = At the center supplies table if there logs, right-click and choose light or w/e and it will make the table invisible and you can noclip into it.
10) Why are the servers still down? A = Unlike our crappy private servers they are still fixing it. May i remind you they have over 50million accounts to rollback.
Credits:- Jagex - Posting some bullcrap every 5 seconds and fucking up the game. Me - Compiling the bits that we care about. zuppers - Youtube video link.

item.title: Runescape is back up
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“zuppers, post:9, topic:336825”][quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=433242.msg3180567#msg3180567 date=1271270058]

8) How did runescape find the glitch?

Countless people reported it including me and I know of a in game mod who also reported it.

BUT THERE WAS A YOUTUBE VID WHICH THEIR YOUTUBE CHANNEL COMMENTED ON.

links?

How about you just go to http://runescape.com and go through the forums like i did till you find it.
ATM I CBA TO DO ANYTHING
[/quote]

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NlchO9QRR4A

Calm down.[/quote]
ok thanks now stop quoting.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape is back up
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[size=36pt]RUNESCAPE IS BACK UP[/size]

  1. My stats are gone way back in the highscores.
    A = They have been set to how they was at 1 AM GMT Apon logging in they will be updated.

  2. Adventurer’s Log says my account does not exist.
    A = It will be back up when the game is online.

  3. Aventurer’s Log says my account did stuff that i did not.
    A = Happened to me to, says i got 31 dungoeneering whilst i got 31, wait till the game is back online, log in and out then check it again.

  4. How long will the rollback be?
    A = Approx. 30mins may be abit less or longer, the rollback will be set to 1second before the glitch occured.

  5. What was the glitch?
    A = You gained huge RuneCrafting EXP Whilst crafting runes in the minigame, Approx. 200k per 100 ess.

  6. Why is Runescapes forums getting spammed?
    A = Not only mopar has fucking idiots posting spam.

  7. I LOST ITEMS WHAT CAN I DO?
    A1 = EVEN IF YOU DID Nothing, if they go according to what you say they will end up giving you a maxed account with moderator’s status and max cash + unlimited banking space.

A2 = NEW STATEMENT BY JAGEX SAYS THEY WILL ONLY ROLLBACK EXP. (LETS HOPE ONLY RCING EXP)
(NOT 100% ACCURATE)

  1. How did runescape find the glitch?
    A = I heard something about youtube and it was reported via the Forums.
    Youtube Link: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NlchO9QRR4A

  2. Any other glitches you know about dungeoneering?
    A = At the center supplies table if there logs, right-click and choose light or w/e and it will make the table invisible and you can noclip into it.

  3. Why are the servers still down?
    A = Unlike our crappy private servers they are still fixing it. May i remind you they have over 50million accounts to rollback.

Credits:-
Jagex - Posting some bullcrap every 5 seconds and fucking up the game.
Me - Compiling the bits that we care about.
zuppers - Youtube video link.
